## Discussion

Use the object in this property to monitor crown-related events yourself. For information about how to configure a crown sequencer object, see [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKCrownSequencer].

# crownSequencer

**Instance Property**

The object to use when directly tracking crown events.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var crownSequencer: WKCrownSequencer { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the object in this property to monitor crown-related events yourself. You can use this object in an interface that also includes a [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKInterfacePicker], but only one of those objects can receive crown events at any given time. For information about how to configure a crown sequencer object, see [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKCrownSequencer].
title: crownSequencer
